See here below information on cities and other places which are too small to deserve a dedicated article.

value: alt=a castle built high in the mountain in the Muslim time
directions=Alaro is a few kilometers north of Consell. From Consell, take the road to Orient. At 1 km out of Alaro, you'll see the sign to Castillo de Alaro.

content=The way to the castle is an expedition, as you'll first have to ride three kilometers on a narrow mountain road, and then hike for about 30 minutes up to the castle. Once on the road, don't stop and go ahead up to the big parking at the restaurant
(which has a very good reputation). From the parking, a good trail bring you to the castle where you'll have an extraordinary viewpoint on Mallorca. Don't go on Sunday, as it will be too crowdy.
directions=north-east of Inca, on the main way Palma-Alcudia
content=Big display of blown glass objects. Interesting as you will see the workshop and the craftsmen working. The factory building is also a beautiful sample of industrial archeology.
directions=2 km NW of Sa Pobla
price=€650-€3500 per week, depending on season
content=A secluded finca with three bedrooms, swimming pool, inside and outside kitchen and all comfort. You'll love the quiet garden. Good position too : 40 km east of
content=Luxury boutique spa hotel in the foothills of the Sierra de Tramuntana in Mallorca and only 15 minutes from the beaches of Pollenca and Alcudia.
hours=Open Fr evening, Sa noon & evening, Su noon
content=This restaurant has a good reputation.
